            <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #FCD34D; line-height: 1.6;">Even the best AI detection tools have significant accuracy problems.         <div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 12px;">

            <strong>False positive rates:</strong> 20-40% of human-written text incorrectly flagged as AI
          </div>
          <div style="background: #1E1E36; padding: 12px; border-radius: 8px;">
            <strong>Non-native speakers:</strong> ESL writers flagged at significantly higher rates
          </div>
          <div style="background: #1E1E36; padding: 12px; border-radius: 8px;">
            <strong>Formal writing:</strong> Academic style more likely to be flagged than casual writing
          </div>
          <div style="background: #1E1E36; padding: 12px; border-radius: 8px;">
            <strong>Easy evasion:</strong> Simple paraphrasing or asking AI to "write more naturally" defeats most detectors

      <h2 style="font-size: 22px; color: #E2E8F0; margin: 0 0 16px 0;">Common AI Patterns</h2>
      <p style="color: #64748B; margin-bottom: 20px;">While not foolproof, these patterns appear more frequently in AI-generated text. Use them as discussion prompts, not definitive evidence.</p>

      <div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; gap: 12px;">
        <div style="background: #16162A; border: 1px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 20px;">
          <div style="display: flex; align-items: flex-start; gap: 12px;">
            <span style="background: #1E1B4B; padding: 8px; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 20px;">üìù</span>
            <div>
              <strong style="color: #E2E8F0;">Characteristic phrases</strong>
              <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #64748B; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;">"It's important to note that...", "In today's rapidly evolving...", "A myriad of factors...", "In conclusion, [restates everything]"</p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div style="background: #16162A; border: 1px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 20px;">
          <div style="display: flex; align-items: flex-start; gap: 12px;">
            <span style="background: #1E1B4B; padding: 8px; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 20px;">üéØ</span>
            <div>
              <strong style="color: #E2E8F0;">Overly balanced structure</strong>
              <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #64748B; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;">Perfect parallel construction, equal treatment of all points, smooth transitions everywhere. Human writing tends to be messier.</p>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div style="background: #16162A; border: 1px solid #2D2D4A; border-radius: 12px; padding: 20px;">
          <div style="display: flex; align-items: flex-start; gap: 12px;">
            <span style="background: #1E1B4B; padding: 8px; border-radius: 8px; font-size: 20px;">üåê</span>
            <div>
              <strong style="color: #E2E8F0;">Generic examples</strong>
              <p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: #64748B; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;">Examples that could apply anywhere vs. specific local context. "A company" vs. "Bunnings in our case study".</p>
            </div>
          </div>

<script>
(function() {
  const experienceId = 'is-this-ai';
  const TOTAL_STEPS = 6;
  const STORAGE_KEY = 'ai-passport-steps-' + experienceId;
  const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
  const uid = urlParams.get('uid') || 'anonymous';

  // Step names for progress bar
  const stepNames = [
    '', // placeholder for index 0
    'Welcome',
    'Detection Game',
    'Tool Problem',
    'AI Patterns',
    'Your Role',
    'Wrap Up'
  ];

  // ---- Step state ----
  let currentStep = 1;
  let highestCompleted = 0; // steps completed so far

  function loadProgress() {
    try {
      const saved = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY) || '{}');
      highestCompleted = saved.highestCompleted || 0;
      currentStep = saved.currentStep || 1;
      // Don't go beyond what's unlocked
      if (currentStep > highestCompleted + 1) currentStep = highestCompleted + 1;
    } catch (e) {
      highestCompleted = 0;
      currentStep = 1;
    }
  }

  function saveProgress() {
    localStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEY, JSON.stringify({
      highestCompleted: highestCompleted,
      currentStep: currentStep
    }));
  }

  // ---- Progress bar rendering ----
  function renderProgressBar() {
    const bar = document.getElementById('progress-bar');
    let html = '';

    for (let i = 1; i <= TOTAL_STEPS; i++) {
      const isCompleted = i <= highestCompleted;
      const isCurrent = i === currentStep;
      const isLocked = i > highestCompleted + 1;

      // Connector line (before each step except the first)
      if (i > 1) {
        html += '<div style="flex: 1; max-width: 40px; height: 2px; background: ' +
          (i <= highestCompleted + 1 ? '#4F46E5' : '#2D2D4A') +
          '; align-self: center;"></div>';
      }

      // Step circle
      let bg, color, border, cursor, opacity;
      if (isCurrent) {
        bg = '#4F46E5'; color = 'white'; border = '2px solid #7C3AED'; cursor = 'default'; opacity = '1';
      } else if (isCompleted) {
        bg = '#0D2818'; color = '#22C55E'; border = '2px solid #22C55E'; cursor = 'pointer'; opacity = '1';
      } else {
        bg = '#1E1E36'; color = '#64748B'; border = '2px solid #2D2D4A'; cursor = 'default'; opacity = '0.5';
      }

      const clickHandler = isCompleted ? 'onclick="goToStep(' + i + ')"' : '';
      const title = isLocked ? 'Complete previous steps first' : stepNames[i];

      html += '<div ' + clickHandler + ' title="' + title + '" style="' +
        'width: 36px; height: 36px; border-radius: 50%; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; ' +
        'font-size: 13px; font-weight: bold; flex-shrink: 0; transition: all 0.2s; ' +
        'background: ' + bg + '; color: ' + color + '; border: ' + border + '; cursor: ' + cursor + '; opacity: ' + opacity + ';">' +
        (isCompleted && !isCurrent ? '‚úì' : i) + '</div>';
    }

    bar.innerHTML = html;
  }

  // ---- Step navigation ----
  function showStep(step) {
    // Hide all steps
    document.querySelectorAll('.exp-step').forEach(function(el) {
      el.style.display = 'none';
    });

    // Show the target step
    var target = document.querySelector('.exp-step[data-step="' + step + '"]');
    if (target) {
      target.style.display = 'block';
    }

    currentStep = step;

    // Mark previous step as completed (if moving forward)
    if (step - 1 > highestCompleted) {
      highestCompleted = step - 1;
    }

    saveProgress();
    renderProgressBar();

    // Scroll to top of the experience
    document.getElementById('experience-app').scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'start' });
  }

  // Expose globally for onclick handlers
  window.goToStep = function(step) {
    // Allow: completed steps, current step, or advancing one step via Continue
    if (step >= 1 && step <= TOTAL_STEPS && step <= highestCompleted + 2) {
      showStep(step);
    }
  };

  // ---- Detection game ----
  const answers = {
    1: { correct: 'ai', explanation: 'AI Generated. Note the phrases "It\'s important to note that..." and "significant transformation" - classic AI markers. Also very balanced and generic.' },
    2: { correct: 'human', explanation: 'Human Written. Personal frustration, informal contractions, specific details about grades and the writing centre suggest authentic student voice.' },
    3: { correct: 'human', explanation: 'Human Written. Specific statistical data (r=0.43, p<0.01) and methodological details suggest real research. AI rarely invents convincing statistics.' },
    4: { correct: 'ai', explanation: 'AI Generated. "Multifaceted concept," "fostering open communication," and the perfectly balanced conclusion are typical AI patterns.' },
    5: { correct: 'ai', explanation: 'AI Generated. Despite the casual tone, notice the careful narrative structure and specific sensory details (flat white, corner table, stickers). AI has learned to mimic human storytelling.' }
  };

  let answered = {};
  let score = 0;

  window.checkAnswer = function(num, guess) {
    if (answered[num]) return;
    answered[num] = true;

    var isCorrect = guess === answers[num].correct;
    if (isCorrect) score++;

    var answerDiv = document.getElementById('answer-' + num);
    answerDiv.style.display = 'block';
    answerDiv.style.background = isCorrect ? '#1A3A2A' : '#3B1010';
    answerDiv.innerHTML =
      '<div style="display: flex; align-items: flex-start; gap: 8px;">' +
        '<span style="font-size: 20px;">' + (isCorrect ? '‚úÖ' : '‚ùå') + '</span>' +
        '<div>' +
          '<strong style="color: ' + (isCorrect ? '#4ADE80' : '#FCA5A5') + ';">' + (isCorrect ? 'Correct!' : 'Not quite.') + '</strong>' +
          '<p style="margin: 8px 0 0 0; color: ' + (isCorrect ? '#4ADE80' : '#FCA5A5') + '; font-size: 14px;">' + answers[num].explanation + '</p>' +
        '</div>' +
      '</div>';

    if (Object.keys(answered).length === 5) {
      showGameScore();
    }
  };

  function showGameScore() {
    var scoreDiv = document.getElementById('game-score');
    scoreDiv.style.display = 'block';

    var emoji, message;
    if (score === 5) {
      emoji = 'üèÜ';
      message = 'Perfect! You have a great eye for AI patterns.';
    } else if (score >= 3) {
      emoji = 'üëç';
      message = 'Good job! Detection is tricky, and you\'re developing good instincts.';
    } else {
      emoji = 'ü§î';
      message = 'Don\'t worry, this is harder than it looks. The lines are increasingly blurry.';
    }

    document.getElementById('score-emoji').textContent = emoji;
    document.getElementById('score-text').textContent = 'You got ' + score + ' out of 5';
    document.getElementById('score-message').textContent = message;
  }

  // ---- Tab switching ----
  window.switchTab = function(tab) {
    document.querySelectorAll('.context-tab').forEach(function(t) {
      if (t.dataset.tab === tab) {
        t.style.background = '#4F46E5';
        t.style.color = 'white';
        t.style.fontWeight = 'bold';
      } else {
        t.style.background = '#1E1E36';
        t.style.color = '#64748B';
        t.style.fontWeight = 'normal';
      }
    });

    document.querySelectorAll('.tab-panel').forEach(function(p) {
      p.style.display = p.dataset.panel === tab ? 'block' : 'none';
    });
  };

  // ---- Completion tracking ----
  const badges = {
    1: { emoji: 'üß™', name: 'Explorer' },
    3: { emoji: 'üß†', name: 'Thinker' },
    5: { emoji: 'üõ†Ô∏è', name: 'Builder' },
    7: { emoji: 'üèÜ', name: 'Champion' }
  };

  window.recordCompletion = function() {
    var btn = document.getElementById('complete-btn');
    btn.disabled = true;
    btn.textContent = 'Recording...';
    btn.style.background = '#94A3B8';

    // Mark final step as completed
    highestCompleted = TOTAL_STEPS;
    saveProgress();
    renderProgressBar();

    saveToLocalStorage();
    showCompletionSuccess();
  };

  function saveToLocalStorage() {
    var completions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ai-passport-completions') || '{}');
    completions[experienceId] = {
      completedAt: new Date().toISOString(),
      uid: uid
    };
    localStorage.setItem('ai-passport-completions', JSON.stringify(completions));
  }

  function showCompletionSuccess() {
    document.getElementById('completion-trigger').style.display = 'none';
    document.getElementById('completion-section').style.display = 'block';

    var completions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ai-passport-completions') || '{}');
    var completedCount = Object.keys(completions).length;

    var badgeHtml = '';
    var nextBadge = null;

    for (var count in badges) {
      if (completedCount >= parseInt(count)) {
        badgeHtml += '<span style="font-size: 24px; margin: 0 4px;" title="' + badges[count].name + '">' + badges[count].emoji + '</span>';
      } else if (!nextBadge) {
        nextBadge = { count: parseInt(count), emoji: badges[count].emoji, name: badges[count].name };
      }
    }

    var progressText = '<div style="margin-bottom: 8px;">' + (badgeHtml || '<span style="color: #94A3B8;">Start your collection!</span>') + '</div>';
    progressText += '<p style="font-size: 13px; color: #64748B; margin: 0;">' + completedCount + ' experience' + (completedCount !== 1 ? 's' : '') + ' completed</p>';

    if (nextBadge) {
      progressText += '<p style="font-size: 12px; color: #94A3B8; margin: 4px 0 0 0;">Next badge: ' + nextBadge.emoji + ' ' + nextBadge.name + ' (' + (nextBadge.count - completedCount) + ' more)</p>';
    }

    document.getElementById('badge-progress').innerHTML = progressText;
  }

  function checkExistingCompletion() {
    var completions = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('ai-passport-completions') || '{}');
    if (completions[experienceId]) {
      document.getElementById('completion-trigger').innerHTML =
        '<div style="color: #22C55E; font-size: 24px; margin-bottom: 8px;">‚úì</div>' +
        '<p style="font-size: 14px; color: #64748B; margin: 0;">You completed this experience on ' + new Date(completions[experienceId].completedAt).toLocaleDateString() + '</p>';
    }
  }

  // ---- Initialise ----
  loadProgress();
  renderProgressBar();
  showStep(currentStep);
  checkExistingCompletion();
})();
</script>
